price: ( ߞߏ߫ ߝߌ߬ߟߊ ) ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߡߊ߬ߛߙߊ߬ߟߌ߫ ߟߊߣߐ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߛߊ߬ߦߌ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߐߙߍ ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ تَوۡصِيَةٗ وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: falā yastaṭīʿūna tawṣiyatan walā ilā ahlihim yarjiʿūna
